title: Got placed in b4 after new flex reset, but profile says im b5 0lp?
body:
Wot? was in promos for b4 yesterday now im 100lp in the gutter despite the client saying i got placed in b4?

I mean ill just climb out again this arvo since im getting like 25lp a win but wot?

replies.body: Still don't understand how my high elo account is in bronze and playing against diamond and plat.  Is there another fix coming?
Hey guys I know it's confusing, check the latest updates here - http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/u2iR6nTU-ranked-flex-match-making-issues
nah i knew about that, i mean the client literally said in big yellow words on my first game this morning "placed in b4" as soon as i came out of the game i was b5 instead.
oh not sure what that is. maybe a client bug of some sort? are you on the Beta client?
Yeah been running the beta client for awhile now (still waiting on that purchase rp button so the programmers can feed their families ;) )

Should be in store and available =D
http://imgur.com/a/V1tjs

Hope you are enjoying the beta and taking the opportunity to record some of your highlight plays with replays.
